00006 void ChannelInfo::addAirFrame(AirFrame* a, simtime_t startTime) {
00007 
00008   //calculate endTime of AirFrame
00009   simtime_t endTime = startTime + a->getDuration();
00010 
00011   //add AirFrame to active AirFrames
00012   activeAirFrames[endTime].push_back(AirFrameTimePair(startTime, a));
00013 
00014   //add to start time map
00015   airFrameStarts[a] = startTime;
00016 }
00017 
00018 simtime_t ChannelInfo::removeAirFrame(AirFrame* a) {
00019 
00020   //get start of AirFrame
00021   simtime_t startTime = airFrameStarts[a];
00022 
00023   //calculate end time
00024   simtime_t endTime = startTime + a->getDuration();
00025 
00026   //remove this AirFrame from active AirFrames
00027   deleteAirFrame(activeAirFrames, a, startTime, endTime);
00028 
00029   //add to inactive AirFrames
00030   addToInactives(a, startTime, endTime);
00031 
00032   /*
00033    * Now check, whether the earliest time-point we need to store information for
00034    * might have moved on in time, since an AirFrame has been deleted.
00035    *
00036    * TODO: check for a more efficient way to find out that earliest time-point
00037    */
00038 
00039   // make a variable for the earliest-start-time of all remaining AirFrames
00040   simtime_t earliestStart = 0;
00041   AirFrameStartMap::const_iterator it = airFrameStarts.begin();
00042 
00043   // if there is an entry for an AirFrame
00044   if (it != airFrameStarts.end())
00045   {
00046     // store the start-time of the first entry as earliestStart so far
00047     earliestStart = (*it).second;
00048 
00049     // go through all other start-time-points
00050     for (; it != airFrameStarts.end(); ++it)
00051     {
00052       // and check if an earlier start-time was found,
00053       // if so, replace earliestStart with it
00054       if( (*it).second < earliestStart )
00055         earliestStart = (*it).second;
00056     }
00057 
00058     // check if the current earliest-start-time is later than the stored
00059     // value so far, if so, replace the earliestInfoPoint
00060     if ( earliestStart > earliestInfoPoint )
00061       earliestInfoPoint = earliestStart;
00062   }
00063 
00064 
00065   //std::cerr << "remove";
00066 
00067   return earliestInfoPoint;
00068 }

00070 void ChannelInfo::deleteAirFrame(AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00071                  AirFrame* a,
00072                  simtime_t startTime, simtime_t endTime) {
00073   AirFrameMatrix::iterator listIt = airFrames.find(endTime);
00074   AirFrameTimeList* list = &listIt->second;
00075 
00076   for(AirFrameTimeList::iterator it = list->begin();
00077        it != list->end(); it++) {
00078 
00079     if(it->second == a) {
00080       it = list->erase(it);
00081       //std::cerr << "Erased AirFrame with start " << startTime << std::endl;
00082       if(list->empty()) {
00083         airFrames.erase(listIt);
00084         //std::cerr << "Was last one in list." << std::endl;
00085       }
00086       return;
00087     }
00088   }
00089   assert(false);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void ChannelInfo::addToInactives(AirFrame* a, simtime_t startTime, simtime_t endTime) {
00093 
00094   //At first, check if some inactives can be removed because the
00095   //AirFrame to deactivate was the last one they intersected
00096   //with.
00097 
00098   //get through inactive AirFrame which intersected with the
00099   //AirFrame to deactivate (only these AirFrames could be
00100   //possibly deleted
00101 
00102   IntersectionIterator inactiveIntersectIt(&inactiveAirFrames, startTime, endTime);
00103 
00104   AirFrame* inactiveIntersect = inactiveIntersectIt.next();
00105   while(inactiveIntersect != 0) {
00106 
00107     simtime_t currentStart = airFrameStarts[inactiveIntersect];
00108     simtime_t currentEnd = currentStart + inactiveIntersect->getDuration();
00109 
00110     //std::cerr << "Found intersecting with to inactive " << currentStart << std::endl;
00111 
00112     //check if this AirFrame still intersects with at least one active AirFrame
00113     if(!isIntersecting(activeAirFrames, currentStart, currentEnd)) {
00114       inactiveIntersectIt.eraseAirFrame();
00115 
00116       //std::cerr << "Doesn't intersect with any active frame anymore -> delete" << std::endl;
00117 
00118       airFrameStarts.erase(inactiveIntersect);
00119 
00120       delete inactiveIntersect;
00121       inactiveIntersect = 0;
00122     }
00123     inactiveIntersect = inactiveIntersectIt.next();
00124   }
00125 
00126   //at last check if the AirFrame to deactivate still intersects with
00127   //at least one active AirFrame. If so, add it to the inactive list.
00128   if(isIntersecting(activeAirFrames, startTime, endTime)) {
00129     //std::cerr << "Removed AirFrame still intersects with at least one active." << std::endl;
00130     inactiveAirFrames[endTime].push_back(AirFrameTimePair(startTime, a));
00131   } else {
00132     //std::cerr << "Removed AirFrame can be removed." << std::endl;
00133     airFrameStarts.erase(a);
00134 
00135     delete a;
00136   }
00137 }

00139 bool ChannelInfo::isIntersecting(const AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00140                  simtime_t from, simtime_t to) const{
00141 
00142   ConstIntersectionIterator it(&airFrames, from, to);
00143   return (it.next() != 0);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void ChannelInfo::getIntersections( const AirFrameMatrix& airFrames,
00147                   simtime_t from, simtime_t to,
00148                   AirFrameVector& outVector) const {
00149 
00150   ConstIntersectionIterator it(&airFrames, from, to);
00151 
00152   AirFrame* intersect = it.next();
00153   while(intersect != 0) {
00154     outVector.push_back(intersect);
00155     intersect = it.next();
00156   }
00157 }
00158 
00159 void ChannelInfo::getAirFrames(simtime_t from, simtime_t to, AirFrameVector& out) const {
00160   //check for intersecting inactive AirFrames
00161   getIntersections(inactiveAirFrames, from, to, out);
00162 
00163   //check for intersecting active AirFrames
00164   getIntersections(activeAirFrames, from, to, out);
00165 }
